name: X-Swap: Booming Edition
overview: Unusual 'Jewel' type of game—drag two or three in a row to take them off the board. Problem is taking them off the board leaves a ‘hole’, putting you in a ‘corner’ so you can’t move other pieces. X-Swap Booming Edition is a Puzzle game, developed and published by Black Fantasy, which was released in Europe in 1997.
